txt.en: 'It would seem that strange things grow on the edge of the foul marshes. Legolas has told me of a moss you encountered growing on the backs of Marsh-lurkers. We believe this moss to have special properties that can cull toxic fumes, straight from the surrounding air.\n\n'If you are willing, find some of this moss and bring it back here to me. I should be able to develop an elixir from the moss.'
Even in the harsh terrain of the Noman-lands, life, though it hardy and few, still flourishes.
'Thank you, my friend. Our company shall put this strange moss you bring us to good use. I hope that it will aid us in the days to come.'
Blighted Marsh-lurkers can be found throughout the marshlands for the Wastes.\n\nCollect Tangled Moss for Arodor.
Arodor can be found at the Camp of the Host.\n\nYou have gathered the moss and should now deliver them to Arodor.
Deliver the Tangled Moss to Arodor
